title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in dataset editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the dataset editor page of the query tab, the children node listing is not displayed. To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a new data set without a SQL statement. 2. Ensure that the new data source has no database/table/column information. Actual result: The children node listing is not displayed when changing the data source for a data set in the dataset editor page of the query tab. To resolve this issue, close the data set editor and reopen it.
